elements.name: app-async-value
elements.description: Selects the right template to render an `AsyncValue` based on its status.

props.name: empty-predicate
props.description: A predicate that defines if a successful value has content, or is empty.

slots.name: initial
slots.description: Content to render while in the `initial` state. If left unspecified, fallbacks to the `loading` slot.

slots.name: loading
slots.description: Content to render while in the `loading` state.

slots.name: empty
slots.description: Content to render while in the `success` state and the `emptyPredicate` is matched. If left unspecified, fallbacks to the `content` or `default` slot.

slots.name: content
slots.description: Content to render while in the `success` state and the `emptyPredicate` is not matched. If left unspecified, fallbacks to the `default` slot.

slots.name: error
slots.description: Content to render while in the `error` state.

slots.name: refreshing
slots.description: Content to render while in the `refreshing` state. If left unspecified, fallbacks to the `empty` slot if the `emptyPredicate` is matched, then fallbacks to the `content` or `default` slot.

slots.name: retrying
slots.description: Content to render while in the `retrying` state. If left unspecified, fallbacks to the `error` slot.
